title: Suite on Agiou Konstantinou
description: The building is shaped like an L. The extension extends into stylish gardens reaching until the end of that side of the house.
features_off: AC, Netflix, an iron, fireplace, bike

title: Apartment on Lefkosias
description: The second floor is bigger than the first, which creates a stylish overhang on two sides of the house. This floor has a different style than the floor below.
features_off: AC, Netflix, an iron, fireplace, bike

title: Apartment on Finkenhubelweg
description: The roof is high, triangular, but one side is longer than the other and is covered with red ceramic tiles. One small chimney pokes out the center of the roof. Many smaller windows let in plenty of light to the rooms below the roof.
features_off: AC, Netflix, an iron, fireplace, bike

title: Apartment on Gendarmenmarkt.
description: The house itself is surrounded by grass, a huge tree in the center and bushes on the borders of the plot.
features_off: AC, Netflix, an iron, fireplace, bike

title: Appartment on Bulevardi
description: The house is equipped with a modern kitchen and one small bathroom, it also has a fairly small living room, three bedrooms, a spacious dining area, a multimedia room and a grand basement.
features_off: AC, Netflix, an iron, fireplace, bike

title: Appartment on Kastanienallee
description: This moderately-sized house has a rustic look to it and is in average condition.  The interior is done in colors that remind you of a coral reef.  The yard is large and looks very formal.
features_off: AC, Netflix, an iron, fireplace, bike

title: Apartment on Louizis Riankour with balcony
description: The room is done in colors that remind you of a cloudy sky and overall looks fairly modern.  Among the first things one notices walking in is a collection of memorabilia.
features_off: AC, Netflix, an iron, fireplace, bike

title: Appartment on Akazienstrasse
description: This large, square dining room/living room combo has coordinating wooden and metal furniture.  The dining seating is cushioned and the living seating is cushionless.  The floor is carpeted and the walls are papered.  Light is provided by table lamps.  The room is done in colors that remind you of a cloudy sky and overall has a quirky look.
features_off: AC, Netflix, an iron, fireplace, bike

title: Appartment on Rue Antoine Dansaert
description: The room is done in vivid colors and overall has a futuristic look.  Among the first things one notices walking in is a well-stocked bookshelf.
features_off: AC, Netflix, an iron, fireplace, bike

title: Studio on Mannerheimintie
description: This cramped, square bedroom has matching metal and plastic furniture.  The floor is carpeted and the walls are painted with a paneled dado.  Light is provided by wall lamps and a ceiling light.  The room is done in colors that remind you of an ice cream sundae and overall has a quirky look.  Among the first things one notices walking in is an overstuffed closet.
features_off: AC, Netflix, an iron, fireplace, bike
